#summary Authorized values for item fields

On this page, you'll find informations on values you can set on different fields when adding a new Auction item ([addItemAuction]()) or a new Fixed price item ([addItemFixedPrice]()). 

Here is a list of each field name accepting only fixed values.

=== id_country ===

 * Accepted values :
  * 'Bla'
  * 'Blu'
